name: The Trial (itch)
description:
The Trial

In The Trial you use motivation to run faster, jump higher and survive! On top of that you can choose (or allow one to be randomly chosen) a mask - each mask has their own unique ability which significantly alters the way you approach levels. Note: you need Java 7 installed to run this game.

Featuring:

  • 22 unique masks, each with their own play-styles and abilities.
  • 28 achievements.
  • 15 levels each with their own theme and mechanics.
  • Local multiplayer with a competitive mode.
